channel.title: [07] How much should they change?
channel.description: I've been working on my character for a good bit now, mostly grinding quests and essence. I was wondering how much do you think they should change? I see consistent debates on the 07 section of the RS forums where some people post some decent suggestions (Graphic options, fixes etc). While a lot agree, a lot of people don't want them to touch the game at all. Should they change anything or should they not even touch it?

item.title: [07] How much should they change?
item.dc:creator: @Kidpaparoach Kidpaparoach
item.description:
@Kidpaparoach wrote:

Lothy:

To be honest, I’m pretty sure everyone would like the main game to just have the same combat system as back then (before overpowered weapons, EoC, etc). People are mistaking the gameplay with the look/feel of the game, when really it’s a gameplay thing.

This = me.
I’d rather that than RS-07 although their are some nice things i.e. old dance emote <3.
Their were many amazing updates since 07 that people are forgetting about and it’s annoying that people seem to have forgotten about them…

[quote=“south-park, post:20, topic:499385”][quote author=drubrkletern link=topic=617612.msg4246495#msg4246495 date=1362116203]

THEY SHOULD TAKE SWAG OUT OF PIRATE DIALOGUES
[/quote]
l0l : D[/quote]
lolol

Read full topic

item.title: [07] How much should they change?
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

Tutorial:

As for general/core game content, I really hope they don’t change too much; however, it would be nice to have a grand exchange. Although this was when item prices started crashing a lot, I find it very inconvenient when trying to get most items, usually for quests. Maybe its just the fact that I can’t teleport.

No, this is one thing that shouldn’t even be negotiable. The reason it hurt the game is because it allowed merchanters to buy and sell mass amounts of items and clans to completely manipulate prices so they and only they can profit off it. This wouldn’t be bad if the players didn’t rely on items being traded. It’s almost like the stock market but with the food you need to eat.

Read full topic

item.title: [07] How much should they change?
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“LilXCj, post:7, topic:499385”][quote author=Tutorial link=topic=617612.msg4244970#msg4244970 date=1362053092]

Things I would like to see:

[ul][li]Make the gameframe a little older looking.[/li]
[li]500x the strength of anti-botting technology implemented. [size=1pt]Everyone begs for 2007scape for nostalgia, then bots on it[/size][/li]
[li]Leave graphical bugs to themselves, it is part of the fun.[/li][/ul]

Things I don’t want to see:

[ul][li]I don’t want a single pixel of the Grand Exchange; it’s time to begin ‘adventuring’ to earn your bank.[/li]
[li]Bans resulting from 3rd-party clients loading the game from their website.[/li][/ul]

Unfortunately, I started playing like 2 months before the Grand Exchange, and I only killed cows and other stuff around Lumbridge for that month. I honestly don’t believe in spending over 30 minutes trying to get one small ingredient for a quest, but if it is a requirement for me in the future, I will have to persevere and learn to overcome that unwanted thing.
[/quote]

You don’t know the pains of runescape classic. There was no run or Grand Exchange. And we had to take up inventory slots just for what we were wearing and a loveing sleeping bag as an anti-botting counter-measure.

I’m sure you can adjust. :)[/quote]
I believe I can too, but I just don’t like spending a lot of time on any individual thing.

Read full topic

item.title: [07] How much should they change?
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Elrick, post:12, topic:499385”][quote author=Flame_ link=topic=617612.msg4245646#msg4245646 date=1362082860]

Different screen sizes, including the “any” option they currently have.

Bonfires - I say this because it’s more realistic and there is no point for players to make lines of fires. Bonfires should have been added ages before it was, just no spirits in this revision obviously.

And make it easier to bot than it already is?
[/quote]
It would remove the incentive to bot. As that is basically the FM version of “Cook All”.[/quote]Firemaking is already one of the easiest to get 99

Read full topic

item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“Tutorial, post:5, topic:499385”][quote author=Flame_ link=topic=617612.msg4244966#msg4244966 date=1362052772]
Things I would like to see:

[ul][li]Make the gameframe a little older looking.[/li]
[li]500x the strength of anti-botting technology implemented. [size=1pt]Everyone begs for 2007scape for nostalgia, then bots on it[/size][/li]
[li]Leave graphical bugs to themselves, it is part of the fun.[/li][/ul]

Things I don’t want to see:

[ul][li]I don’t want a single pixel of the Grand Exchange; it’s time to begin ‘adventuring’ to earn your bank.[/li]
[li]Bans resulting from 3rd-party clients loading the game from their website.[/li][/ul]

[/quote]
Unfortunately, I started playing like 2 months before the Grand Exchange, and I only killed cows and other stuff around Lumbridge for that month. I honestly don’t believe in spending over 30 minutes trying to get one small ingredient for a quest, but if it is a requirement for me in the future, I will have to persevere and learn to overcome that unwanted thing.[/quote]You’ve never experienced the joy of grinding then. Get all of the ingrediants yourself. The difference between 07scape and EOCScape - you can buy everything on EOCscape that you have to work for on 07scape.

Read full topic

item.title: [07] How much should they change?
item.dc:creator: @Rodgerwilco Rodgerwilco
item.description:

Keep farming how it is (no right click features to get the task done easier)
